戵字的基本解释

戵
qú
古代戟一类的兵器。

戵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qú］
［《廣韻》其俱切，平虞，羣。］
同“瞿1”。
古兵器名。即三锋矛。

戵字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【戈字部】　戵； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页414第31
【唐韻】其俱切【集韻】權俱切，?音衢。【廣韻】戟屬也。古謂四出矛爲戵。　又通作瞿。【書·顧命】一人冕執瞿，立于西垂。

戵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
戵字的起名意思

暂无。

Punish
Basic explanation of words
Punish
qú
Weapons such as ancient halberds.
Punish
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qú］
["Guangyun" all cut, Pingyu, group. ]
Same as "Qu 1".
Ancient weapon name. That is, the three-sided spear.
Punish
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Ge Zi Department] 　戵; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 414 31
[Tang Yun] Its all cut [Ji Yun] The right is all cut,? Sound Qu. [Guang Yun] Halberd is also. In ancient times, it was said that all spears were used to fight.　Tong Zuo Qu again. 【Book·Gu Ming】One person is in charge of Qu, standing in Xichuan.
